name: Rhythm Command
description:
A Missle Command Rhythm Game

Meteors are coming, and they need to be stopped! Time to use earth’s last defense against those damn dirty rocks. Use the Safety Cannon(TM) to blast those meteors back to hell!

The Good Guys(TM) have deployed aid packages for the cities affected, just make sure you send the signal to deploy the parachutes before they slam into the city causing irreparable damage.

Controls |mouse| left click to fire missiles where the mouse is pointing | 1-4 | use the number keys to deploy the parachutes on the aid packages when the're in the frame above the city
